Translations.Text: Unus unus to respond est those listen DEUS resurrects PERITUS; they ultimately return EUM
They dictus unus certain signum advenit eum his Dominus! Dictus DEUS est able to send signum multus de them non know
Totus creatures terra totus birds fly cum wings est communities vos. Nos non sinister anything hoc book To their Dominus totus these creatures summoned
Those reject noster proofs est surdus dumb in total darkness. Whomever DEUS testimentum He sends astray whomever He testimentum He leads straight path
Dictus Quod si deus retribution advenit vos Hora advenit vos vos implore DEUS vos est truthful
fact est unus Eum vos implore He answers tuus prayer si He testimentum vos forget tuus idols
Nos sent (messengers) communities vos nos put them to test per adversity hardship they implore
Si unus they implored when noster test afflicted them! Instead their hearts hardened devil adorned their works their eyes
When they sic disregard message dedit them nos open pro them gates de everything. Tunc just prout they rejoice in quod dedit them nos punish them suddenly they become utterly stunned
wicked est sic annihilated Praise est DEUS Dominus universe
Dictus Quod si DEUS took away tuus hearing tuus eyesight sigillum tuus minds qui deus DEUS restore these vos? Note quam nos explain revelations note quam they adhuc deviate
Dictus Quod si deus retribution advenit vos suddenly post liber bannorum it non wicked qui est incur annihilation
Nos non send messengers deliverers bonus news alias prout warners. Those believe reform habet nihil fear nor testimentum they grieve
Prout pro those reject noster revelations they incur retribution their wickedness

dictus ego non dictus to vos ut ego possess treasures DEUS. Nor perfecit ego know future Nor perfecit ego dictus to vos ego est angel! Ego simply subsequentis quod revealed me. Dictus est Est blind same prout seer? Vos non reflect
Ac preach hoc (Quran) to those reverence summoning their Dominus! - they habet nullus Eum prout Dominus ac Magister nor intercessor! - Ut they attain salvation
Non dismiss those implore their Dominus feria ac nox, devoting Eum alone Vos non est responsible pro their reckoning nor est they responsible pro tuus reckoning Vos dismiss them vos est transgressor
Nos sic test people de each alius let them dictus (mockingly) Est these people nos beatus DEUS? est Est DEUS non aware de appreciative unus

When those believe in noster revelations advenit vos vos dictus Salmun â€˜Alaykum (Pax est vos). Tuus Dominus decretum mercy est His attribute Ergo anyone among vos commits transgression ignorance repents deinde reforms tunc He Forgiving Merciful
Nos sic explain revelations point via de the wicked
dictus ego forbidden ex worshipping quod vos worship DEUS. Dictus ego non subsequentis tuus opinions! Alias ego iit astray non guided
dictus ego habet solid proof ex my Dominus vos rejected it Ego non control retribution vos challenge me bring Judgment belongs DEUS alone He narrates truth He est bonus scabinus
Dictus Si ego controlled retribution vos challenge me bring whole matter terminated long ago! DEUS knows BENE QUI wicked est
